item.description:
RSVP to obtain accessing details: https://bitly.com/webinartime

 

Three parts presentation:

Part One: The Dallas real estate market - Useful info about the Dallas metro

Part Two: Rentals in Dallas - where & what to buy, step by step purchase process

Part Three: High returns flips in Dallas - how to maximize returns & invest remotely & successfully in flip properties

Extensive Q&A about these programs and the metro

 

This webinar will take us through the process of a successful fix and flip project.

RSVP to obtain accessing details: https://bitly.com/webinartime
item.name: Dallas Flips & Rentals - A Discussion with Local Expert Investment Team
